Item.Risk_Statement: Vulnerabilities will not be validated or confirmed.  The organization will be unable to assess their ability to withstand an attack directed at their information resources.
Item.Description: The organization conducts penetration testing [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] on [Assignment: organization-defined information systems or system components].
Item.Example: Penetration tests are performed on a recurring basis.
Item.Agency_Implementation: The information security officer shall ensure penetration testing of mission-critical, sensitive, and public-facing Agency information resources are performed on a recurring basis.
